name: Mysis Horror Game
description:
Mysis The Cat is very aggresive and angry! Mysis The Cat Is a Normal Birman Cat, She Hates when people escapes from the hospital! She will hit very hard on your head with her Knife.But are you able to escape an abandoned hospital with mysis the cat inside? Find important items to escape and be careful, She is fast and wants to kill you!  You have only 1 life,  Are you able to find all the keys to get out? Good luck...

//

Key Inputs:

To Interact Click E.

To Crouch, Click C.

To Drop Items, Click G.

To Play Again In Game Over Menu, Click Space.

///

(Images and visual design by: MalomStudios. Developed, programmed and game designed by: frikjumno.)
